website_title: Chartered College of Teaching - Chartered College of Teaching
website_summary: The Chartered College of Teaching is the professional body for teachers. Our mission is to empower a knowledgeable and respected teacher profession. We are working to develop effective, evidence-informed teachers and leaders.

seo_meta_description: The Chartered College of Teaching is the professional body for teachers.
